items.title: laggy
items.description: cli tool to simulate bad networks and inject chaos into test environments
items.longDescription:
enables realistic network failure testing for any Node.js app or test runner
supports reproducible chaos with seedable randomness
provides real-world network presets (slow-3g, flaky, lie-fi, etc.)
intercepts both fetch and http/https requests for comprehensive coverage
clean CLI and programmatic API, easy integration
